I really dont like ksp 1.0+ i want to go back to the way it was, can someone help me find a way to get it back to the way it was? im not great with computers so im not really sure what to do.

- - - Updated - - -

Im using the steam version BTW

If you previously made a copy of your game folder in 0.90, that's still playable. If you didn't then you don't have a legit source for it, since Steam has moved on to 1.0.2 now.

For your own sanity as KSP progresses in the future, I'd really suggest learning to like 1.0.2 - it's really not hard, it's just different and has a few new rules to learn. If there's specific problems that are bugging you, ask the community how to solve them. Most likely you just need to modify the way you build a little ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
well the advanced physics make my computer lag i CANT get used to it i want the old version or im done with this game.
Right click on the game in the Steam list, select properties, then Betas and try the previous stable version.
it says it needs beta access code to unlock private betas where do i find the one for JUST BEFORE 1.0
You don't need an access code. Just click on the drop down menu.
